page_content: The page provides practical information and tools for environmental protection in Zürich.
The page serves as a guide for municipalities in Zürich, offering information on environmental regulations and planning tasks related to construction.
The page discusses the importance of pedestrian traffic in Zürich, providing statistics and outlining measures to promote it.
The page provides detailed information on the construction of a relief tunnel to manage extreme flood events in Zürich.
The page offers climate strategy guidance for municipalities in Zürich, including tools and measures for climate adaptation and protection.
The page discusses policies and services related to aging, including financial security, health promotion, and housing options for the elderly in Zürich.
The page outlines the Zürcher Klimadialog initiative, aimed at fostering collaboration between cantonal and municipal representatives for climate action.
